FuncDef: The reset layer3-subscriber statistics port-mismatch command clears statistics on Layer 3 users' packets that are discarded due to an interface mismatch.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an interface name.
The value is a string of 1 to 256 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies an interface type.
The value is a string of 1 to 256 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies an interface number.
The value is a string of 1 to 256 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset layer3-subscriber statistics port-mismatch interface GigabitEthernet 1/0/1.1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear statistics on Layer 3 users' packets that are discarded due to an interface mismatch, run the reset layer3-subscriber statistics port-mismatch command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
